about_the_game:
This set of 3D models contains various wheelguns, reputedly obsolete but as enticing and iconic as ever.

The list of the included models:
1. Chiappa Rhino
2. Colt Python
3. Colt SAA
4. Nagant M1895
5. Ruger Redhawk
6. Ruger Old Army
7. Ruger LCR
8. Ruger New Vaquero
9. S&W Schofield
10. Webley Fosbery

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: any
  • Additional Notes: Video Output: HDMI 1.4 or DisplayPort 1.2 or newer, USB Port: 1x USB 2.0 or greater port.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: CPU: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Video Card: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480, equivalent or better.
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: any
  • Additional Notes: Video Output: HDMI 1.4 or DisplayPort 1.2 or newer, USB Port: 1x USB 2.0 or greater port.
